page.title: 05Our Classroom
page.content:
Our Classroom In our room we have a fish tank with fish in it.We have lots of pictures on the wall and writing.We do science.We have got an art table and we do lots of art on it.There are toys and dressing up clothes.Our room is tidy and comfortable and neat and clean.We have a computer and sand tray and water trough and carpet and cushions.
Things we do I like number and the computer. I like number because I am very good at it.I like playing on the computer because I like playing games on it too. we write on it and play turtle. I like cooking and sewing. I like cooking because we can eat the cakes afterwards. By Wesley Lovett aged 6
